titles.title: God Will Lift Up Your Head

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Give to the wind your fear;
Hope and be undismayed.
God hears your sighs and counts your tears.
God will lift up, God will lift up...

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lift up your head
(God will lift up your head)
He'll lift up your head
(God will lift up your head)
God'll lift up your head
(God will lift up your head)
Lift up your head ... will lift up
(God will lift up)
He will lift up, lift up your head.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Leave to His sovereign sway
To choose and to command.
Then shall we wandering on His way;
Know how wise and how strong...

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
How wise and how strong
(God will lift up your head)
Strong is His hand
(God will lift up your head)
How wise and how strong
(God will lift up your head)
How strong is His hand
(God will lift up)
Lift up your head.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Through waves and clouds and storms, He gently clears the way.
Wait 'cause in His time, so shall this night
Soon end in joy, soon end in joy,
Soon end in joy, soon end in joy.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
(God will lift up your head)
Soon end in joy
(God will lift up your head)
Soon end in joy
(God will lift up your head)
Soon end in joy
(God will lift up your head)
God will lift your head
(God will lift up your head)
God'll lift up your head
(God will lift up your head)
God'll lift up your head
(God will lift up your head)
God'll lift up your head
(God will lift your head)
He'll lift up ...
He'll lift up your head
(God will lift it up)
your head ... your head
God will lift up your head
(God will lift your head)
